column2: Racial Seeding has been permanently disabled. This is controlled by Random/Shattered World settings instead.\n§KStop asking about it.§!
Chance for any independent rulers and their vassals to be a special race on the third day.\n§KUnavailable in Random/Shattered Worlds.§!
The world will remain as it was.
All starting characters will be a Luxuria race on the third day.\n§KUnavailable in Random/Shattered Worlds.§!
Luxuria Fantasia portraits will be assigned to LF races as normal.
LF races will use the included portraits from Cheri Portraits.
Luxuria Fantasia static portraits on LF races will not be applied. Unique NPCs and children will still have custom portraits.
Courtiers will spawn as their default race.
Courtiers will spawn as the race of their new liege.
Everyone lives in peace and harmony. Negative opinion modifiers will remain.
Demons, divines, nekos, kitsune, elves, and orcs will attempt to destroy any trace of their opposite race.
